priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Subject Status Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C124305

self.title: CDISC SDTM Subject Status Test Code Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to test codes for the subject's status, which is evaluated periodically to determine if it has changed.
name: Subject Status Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Subject Status Test Code Terminology

terms.definition: The state or condition of the subject's availability to provide information about their health status after they are no longer receiving study treatment.
The state or condition of being living or deceased; also includes the case where the vital status is unknown.
